paper_metadata.title: Spectrum of transthyretin gene mutations and clinical characteristics of Polish patients with cardiac transthyretin amyloidosis
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for TTR gene mutations, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: Unrelated male patients, ages 49 to 67 years
patients.phenotype: Cardiac hereditary ATTR, mixed phenotype with polyneuropathy in some cases

individual_records.phenotype_details: advanced biventricular HF, history of ischemic heart disease
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient with p.Phe53Leu mutation (proband 1) died of biventricular HF.
Proband 2 died due to sudden cardiac death.

individual_records.phenotype_details: asymptomatic, good exercise tolerance, underwent heart and liver transplantation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Proband 3 successfully underwent combined heart and liver transplantation with a 15-month survival from the surgery.

functional_data.summary: The p.Phe53Leu mutation is associated with late-onset, progressive polyneuropathy and severe cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, positive family history in 6 probands.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation might be endemic in the Polish population.
key_quotes: This TTR mutation might be endemic in the Polish population.
Most of the patients with p.Phe53Leu mutation (71.4%)... had also polyneuropathy at various stages of advancement.

patients.demographics: Unrelated male patients, ages 49 and 67 years
patients.phenotype: restrictive cardiomyopathy, ocular symptoms in one case

individual_records.phenotype_details: early stage of the disease (NYHA class I), restrictive LV filling pattern
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Proband 8, a 49-year-old male, was diagnosed at a very early stage of the disease (NYHA class I).
A second patient with p.Glu109Lys TTR mutation, proband 9, was referred to our institution due to a 3 month history of progressive exertional dyspnea.

functional_data.summary: The p.Glu109Lys mutation is characterized by early onset and severe phenotype.

key_quotes: p.Glu109Lys TTR mutation was reported previously only in 3 families and is characterized by early onset.
A second patient with p.Glu109Lys TTR mutation... suffered from periorbital purpura, weight loss, mild symptoms of polyneuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive HF, significantly decreased LV systolic function
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Only 1 patient, 67-year-old male with progressive HF (NYHA class II/III at initial presentation)... was identified with p.Ala101Val TTR mutation.

functional_data.summary: The p.Ala101Val mutation is an unusually rare mutation associated with severe biventricular HF.

variants.additional_notes: Only 2 patients were previously reported with this mutation.
key_quotes: p.Ala101Val TTR mutation is an unusually rare mutation.
The patient also suffered from orthostatic hypotension, bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome.

tables_processed.table_caption: Clinical characteristics of patients with hereditary cardiac ATTR

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text and tables.
